name: Megabot
description: Megabot is an automated trading bot that interacts with AI algorithms capable of sniping and trading ERC20 projects automatically, while avoiding honeypots, rugs, and slow rugs through a smart alert system that can detect suspicious activity on contracts. By holding Megabot coin, users will be able to enable the Megabot trading bot and enjoy safe profits with less stress. The Megabot token buy tax is 0%, but we have a 7% sell tax, that goes for marketing, CEX listing and automatic burn, making the project deflationary and supporting the price in the future. Megabot is integrated with smart AI technical analysis software that enables the bot to buy and sell from specific areas after analyzing the chart, volume profile, demand and supply areas, and project safety. Everyone can use Megabot for automated AI algorithmic trading and enjoy consistent, stress-free profits, saving their self's from the hourly memecoins chart checks on dextools, Plus, they can earn from other traders' profits by referring people to use MEGABOT through their link.
